name: SwSh Back and Front Models
description:
Adds back and front models for gen 8 mons.
It's SUUPER beta right now. Still need to fix the scaling issue with some models like Weezing and Corviknight.
additional_info:
UPDATE (1-30): I fixed the scaling on a lot of the pokemon. Mostly just final evos.
UPDATE (1-31): Added shiny models for all the same Pokemon.
